attributes.additional_details: Public sale of fireworks allows them to fall in the hands of irresponsible people which proves extremely dangerous every year they are used as weapons or put many people in hospital they also cause extreme distress for animals and with the lack of restrictions on times and purchases this can go on throughout the night and causes soem animals to even die as a result of this
attributes.background: Ban the use/purchase of fireworks by the public or for home use - only allow commercial fireworks shows

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868
